Sqrt(2) (dig = 100 000 000)

Distirbution of difference's digits with different values of |p-q|

pq=1 (e.g. p=0, q=1) -> {652.656,{44998884,4999500,0,0,0,0,0,0,5001558,45000058}}
pq=2 (e.g. p=0, q=2) -> {485.469,{39988692,4998738,4999353,0,0,0,0,5003499,4998738,40010980}}
pq=3 (e.g. p=0, q=3) -> {487.5,{40002710,0,5001582,5002598,0,0,5000655,5001582,0,39990873}}
pq=4 (e.g. p=0, q=4) -> {487.844,{39966422,0,0,4999205,5000849,5003032,4999205,0,0,40031287}}
pq=5 (e.g. p=0, q=5) -> {553.938,{40000066,0,0,0,10002237,9998344,0,0,0,39999353}}
